mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_asset_target ( ta_us_num, ta_as_num, ta_target_percent, ta_end_date) VALUES ( #{ta_us_num}, #{ta_as_num}, #{ta_target_percent}, #{ta_end_date})
mapper.select: SELECT ua.as_asset_type, ua.as_currency, ua.as_won, ROUND(ua.as_won / total.total_won * 100, 2) AS current_percent, ut.ta_target_percent, ROUND(ROUND(ua.as_won / total.total_won * 100, 2) - ut.ta_target_percent, 2) AS gap_percent FROM user_asset ua JOIN ( SELECT SUM(as_won) AS total_won FROM user_asset WHERE as_us_num = #{userId} ) total JOIN user_asset_target ut ON ua.as_type = ut.ta_as_num WHERE ua.as_us_num = #{userId} AND ut.ta_us_num = #{userId}
